attributes.action: Warrington against proposed NHS cuts to limit A&E opening hours
attributes.background: closing an A&E in any hospital is madness. We will not stand by and have the lives of ourselves and loves one put in danger just to save money. another solution must be found.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
